sense.def: Illness Sign of an uncomfortable feeling of fullness in a region that, when pressed, feels hard. Su wen 素問 74: 厥陰之復，少腹堅滿，裏急暴痛 , “When the ceasing yin [qi] takes revenge, the lower abdomen hardens and [has a feeling of] fullness . There is internal tightness and violent pain”. Jian pi 堅癖 , hard aggregation-illness [6]

Pathological Condition of difficult-to-cure, painful lumps in the region of flanks and abdomen formed by stagnating phlegm rheum and blood that fail to dissipate. Jin gui yao lue 金匱要略 Lj: 婦人經水閉不利，臟堅癖不止，中有乾血，下白物，礬石丸主之 , “When menstruation is blocked and when there is a hard aggregation-illness of dried blood in the depots that does not end, with the passing down of white matter, this is controlled by pills with fan shi ”.
